articles.description: Over 80 years, Dame Vera Lynn became a powerful totem of our national identity. Her death marks a profound moment in history
articles.content: The death of Dame Vera Lynn last Thursday led news bulletins and dominated the front pages of the papers. The reaction was no surprise. She was not merely an entertainer and a celebrity: she was for … [+3377 chars]

articles.title: ‘Lord Of The Rings’ director Peter Jackson pays tribute to Ian Holm: “Farewell, dear Bilbo” - NME
articles.description: 'Lord Of The Rings' director Peter Jackson has paid tribute to Ian Holm, who starred as Bilbo Baggins in the movies, calling him "a kind, generous man".
articles.content:
Lord Of The Rings director Peter Jackson has paid an emotional tribute to the late Ian Holm.
Holm, who starred as Bilbo Baggins in the trilogy of films, passed away this week at the age of 88.
